titlecard.heading: For the Bride & Groom
titlecard.from: A litte encouragement from us all!

card.note: Make each other laugh at least once a day.
card.author: Christin

card.note: Remember to put the damn seat down Ryan
card.author: Christin

card.note: Always take gopd care of each other. Pray together, be kind and loving to each other, and never leave or go to sleep angry. /RYou are well balanced in your personalities which is a great start for a wonderful life together.
card.author: Grandma Rachael

card.note: If you ever get into a fight just think of Zack and I canoeing, or me eating 12 hotdogs and crying the entire camping trip!! Or best yet, the picture of me in the green sweatshirt... I know that will put a smile on both of your faces :) love you!
card.author: Kaitlyn

card.note: Cheers to #100YearsofFriendship and Ryan adopting us all as his own.
card.author: Your Gals

card.note: Happiness is a choice and you have both chosen well! May you be blessed for all of time.
card.author: Annie

card.note: Marriage is a relationship in which one person is always right and the other is the husband! :) Danielle don't get mad when Ryan mounts tvs on the Wall and doesn't measure. He tried lol
card.author: Ali

card.note: "You're going to spend the rest of your life learning about each other and every now and then things blow up. But the beauty of marriage is that if you picked the right person and you love each other you'll always figure out a way to get through it."/R/RNicholas Sparks/R
card.author: To a lifetime of <3 & :-) MG & Josh

card.note: It all started when 213 met above the tavern. Wishing you a lifetime of laugher, happiness, and love! /R/R
card.author: Tara

card.note: You two balance each other very well, don't ever forget to not take yourselves to seriously. P.S. I don't ever yay!
card.author: Natalie!

card.note: You guys are a perfect fit. Because when Danielle gets mad or high strung or stressed out, Ryan you always stay calm and definitely don't add fuel to the fire! -- it's a nice quality :)
card.author: Ali

card.note: Thank god for ballerinas..and their studios.. and frat boys who board there ????????
card.author: Ali

card.note: Always respect each other/RAnd always kiss each other hello and goodbye especially when you have children/RIt's always important they know that your in love /RP.S. communication is also important/R
card.author: MB

card.note: Danielle even though you didn't like me the first year we met ???? I'm/RGlad we found our ways to eachother and hope the last 10 years are a reflection of the decades to come. If I had to share you with anyone I'm glad it's sugar!
card.author: Ali

card.note: "Damn..." - Ryan Humphries, Above the pub 2008
card.author: Kristy

card.note: “When you meet someone who changes the way your heart beats, dance with them to that rhythm, for as long as the song lasts.” –k.d.
card.author: Kristy

card.note: “To have the full value of joy, you must have someone to divide it with.” –Mark Twain
card.author: Kristy

card.note: "Listen without interrupting, speak without accusing, give without sharing, pray without ceasing, answer without arguing, share without pretending, enjoy without complaint, trust without wavering, forgive without punishing, promise without forgetting…"
card.author: Kristy

card.note: "Happy things:/Rtea,/Ra good read,/Ryour smile,/Rpuppy snuggles,/Rrainy days,/Rold photos,/Rsoft lips,/Rhearing ‘I love you’"
card.author: Kristy

card.note: “...the heart has no wrinkles” wishing you both the very best forever and always – I could not be happier for the two of you!!! Love yas the most
card.author: Kristy

card.note: Danielle, you knew Ryan was a keeper when he not only dried your tears but your best friends' too./R/R...and then safely packed me in a cab home from Nard's : )
card.author: Christine

card.note: "we're always trying new things" - Danielle /R/Rkeep doing that ; )
card.author: Christine

card.note: "Ryan's my favorite of the boyfriends" - Me /R/R"Ryan's my favorite of the Husbands" - future me
card.author: Christine

card.note: You're so blessed to have found each other. Here's to a lifetime of love, happiness and laughter!
card.author: Christine

card.note: Ryan or Danielle, you can't speak on the phone?/R/RRule: You must clean up after the other's sleepover - the more hungover, the better! /R/R(this rule applies to all bachelor and bachelorette festivities to come!!)
card.author: Christine

card.note: Always say yes. Never stop dating. Always sleep naked.
card.author: Tiffany!

card.note: You don’t need to be on the same wavelength to succeed in marriage. You just need to be able to ride each other’s waves.
card.author: Tiffany!

card.note: To keep your marriage brimming,/Rwith love in the loving cup, /Rwhenever you're wrong admit it, /Rwhenever you're right shut up
card.author: Tiffany!

card.note: Say I love you, EVERYDAY
card.author: Tiffany!

card.note: Don't get too caught up in your daily routines that you miss the joy little things can bring to you everyday
card.author: Tiffany!

card.note: Don't forget to laugh.
card.author: Chelsea Wittman

card.note: May your life together be filled with all the right ingredients: /Ra heap of love, a dash of humor, /Ra touch of romance, and a spoonful of understanding.
card.author: Christin

card.note: Days will come and go but your love should forever grow.
card.author: Christin

card.note: Through the storms of life, may your love for one another be steadfast and strong. Wishing you joy and happiness
card.author: all of us

card.note: There is no more lovely, friendly and charming relationship, communion or company than a good marriage...
card.author: Martin Luther

card.note: The greatest thing you'll ever learn is just to love and be loved in return
card.author: Eden Abhez

card.note: Two such as you with such a master speed cannot be parted nor be swept away from one another once you are agreed that life is only life forevermore together wing to wing and oar to oar
card.author: Robert Frost

card.note: Love is a magic ray/Remitted from the burning core of the soul/Rand illuminating the surrounding earth./R/RIt enables us /Rto perceive life as a beautiful dream/Rbetween one awakening and another.
card.author: Khalil Gibran

card.note: God must have spent a little more time on you (and Ryan's relationship)
card.author: N

card.note: God must have spent a little more time on you (and Ryan's relationship)
card.author: N'Sync

card.note: To the world you may be one person,/Rbut to one person you may be the world.
card.author: Bill Wilson

card.note: Love is your soul's recognition of it's counterpart in another
card.author: John Beckwith (Wedding Crashers)

card.note: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul and makes us reach for more, that plants a fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds
card.author: The Notebook

card.note: Nothing that's worthwhile is ever easy, remember that
card.author: anonymous

card.note: Be the ones who teach each other the value of love
card.author: Christin

card.note: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness
card.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

card.note: It's got to be that can't-eat, can't-sleep, reach-for-the-stars, over-the-fence, World Series kind of stuff
card.author: It Takes Two

card.note: And Ryan, if all else fails, send an email that simply says: /R"I know I screwed up, but I will love you forever"
card.author: Christin (Sex & the City)

card.note: The real lover is the man who can thrill you by kissing your forehead or smiling into your eyes or just staring into space
card.author: Marilyn Monroe

card.note: The perfection of love is that it's not perfect
card.author: Taylor Swift
